title: Anxiety Young People
content:
There can be side effects as well. It’s important to keep talking to whānau, friends and your healthcare provider about how you’re feeling.
####  Related topics on Healthify 
[Mental health services for young people](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/m/mental-health-services-for-young-people "Mental health services for young people")

[Anxiety topics](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/anxiety-topics)
